data.Title: Google Search to Only Index Mobile-Friendly Sites After July 5th
data.Description: Google announces that websites inaccessible on mobile devices will be de-indexed after July 5th, marking a significant step in mobile-first indexing.

data.Title: Google Search Console Links Report Fixed
data.Description: Google has resolved issues with the Search Console links report, potentially restoring accuracy to backlink data.

data.Title: Google Expands Keyword Options for Popular Products
data.Description: Google expands its keyword options for popular products, potentially impacting product listing visibility.

data.Title: Google Updates Privacy Policies for Ads and Analytics Users in Response to New State Laws
data.Description: Google informs advertisers and analytics users about upcoming changes due to new privacy laws in certain US states.

data.Title: Google Business Profiles May Allow SMS and WhatsApp Integration in Chat
data.Description: Google Business Profiles may soon allow businesses to add SMS or WhatsApp numbers to their chat section.

data.Title: Perplexity Pages Gaining Visibility in Google Search Results
data.Description: Perplexity Pages are appearing in Google's AI Overviews and featured snippets, potentially signaling a shift in search results.

data.Title: Google Search Algorithm Updated with Focus on Core Web Vitals
data.Description: Google has updated its search ranking algorithm, with a focus on Core Web Vitals. Sites that were negatively impacted by the October 2023 update saw further drops in rankings.

data.Title: Google Discover May Be Renamed to Google Home
data.Description: Speculation arises that Google may rename its Discover feed to Google Home.

data.Title: Spotify to Increase Premium Pricing in the US
data.Description: Spotify announces a price increase for its premium subscription service in the United States, raising the monthly fee to $11.99.
